thread.title: Argos launch huge baby and toddler sale on thousands of items, including baby monitors, high chairs and sterilisers
thread.title_full: Argos launch huge baby and toddler sale on thousands of items, including baby monitors, high chairs and sterilisers

author: Molly Holt
title: Argos launch huge baby and toddler sale on thousands of items, including baby monitors, high chairs and sterilisers

organizations.name: invalid email  high street chain argos
clair de lune dimple white wicker moses basket

text:
Argos launch huge baby and toddler sale on thousands of items, including baby monitors, high chairs and sterilisers There's up to 25% off bedding and toys, baby clothes from £6.99 and much, much more Share Save money on all things baby and toddler (Photo: Argos) Share Get money updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
High street chain Argos has launched a huge baby and toddler event, with discounts of up to 30%. 
The sale includes everything from toys to highchairs and baby monitors , as well as heavily discounted products from big brand names such as Fisher Price . 
Whether you're expecting your first or want to treat your toddler, its prime time to bag a bargain on essentials for the little one. Read More Motorola Video Monitor , £79.99 (was £119.99) It also has five lullabies to sing your little one to sleep. (Photo: Argos) 
With a 2.8" full colour LCD screen, ability to zoom, plus infrared night vision to see your baby in the dark, this nifty device means that you can always keep a close eye on the most important thing in your life. Vtech Whale mobile , £27.49 (was £54.99) A soothing light display projects onto the ceiling to mesmerise your child straight to sleep. (Photo: Argos) 
Featuring relaxing melodies and calming ocean sounds, all the creatures of the sea will send your little one straight to sleep, so you can enjoy a well-needed break. Read More 6 Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature bottles , £13.49 (was £26.99) A baby can never have too many bottles (Photo: Argos) 
Save half price off these Tommee Tippee bottles that have an anti-colic valve, (which means it reduces the amount of air the babies swallow while drinking), to make feeding more enjoyable for baby and to give you a peace of mind. Clair de Lune Dimple White Wicker Moses Basket , £49.99 (was £90.99) The classic carry cot comes complete with two carry handles, hood, padded liner & mattress. (Photo: Argos) 
This white wicker moses basket will keep your newborn nice and snug - and at just under half price it will help you save some extra pennies too. Read More Star Wars Gift Set , £7.99 (was £11.99) Luke, I am your father... and therefore I shall dress you in this. 
This insanely cool Star Wars sleepsuit and bodysuit (with hat!) will make your newborn baby the coolest kid on the block. Joie Elevate Group 1-2-3 Black Car Seat , £49.99 (was £59.99) Super comfy and complete with a cup holder. (Photo: Argos) 
Suitable for kids from 1-12, this car seat will no doubt be your greatest aide through their childhood, with added side impact protection and a 5 point harness with individual harness tensioners. There's also a cup holder, because, well, why not. Read More Mamas and Papas Swirl Stripe pushchair , £59.99 (was £129.99) When the seat is fully reclined, the pram also holds a lot of shopping. (Photo: Argos) 
A pretty teal and grey umbrella buggy that keeps kids warm on walks to the shops and around the park, thanks to the cosy foot muff. Tomy Boon Jellies Suction Cup Bath Toys , £8.99 (was £10.99) This toy sucks (to the wall). (Photo: Argos) 
With suction bottoms, these jelly toys can be attached to anything from the bath tub, to the wall and to each other, for endless bath time fun. Graco Fruit Salad Armchair , £39.99 (was £59.99) Feeding time should always be accompanied by fruit. Even if its only the picture kind. (Photo: Argos) 
Get your kids accustomed to fruit with some good old product placement. This fruit salad armchair is fun and quirky and will surely have them asking for apples in no time at all. It also stores away easily. Like us on Facebook
